excerpt.rendered:
Promotional price until January 10, 2023

SUCCEED IN YOUR STUDIES, YOUR EXAMS, YOUR PROJECTS (33,4 Mo)

This introductory course of Phosphenic Mixing will allow you to understand:
– Why the light is a source of well-being and a natural stimulant.
– How to structure ideas thanks the light.
– What are the techniques which improve learning, concentration and reasoning.
– Why failing at school is not a fatality.
– How to overcome troubles such as dyslexia or dysorthographia.
– How to increase your chances of succeeding exams.
– Why the rhythm is another secret of success.

Thus you will improve your capabilities and optimize your performances by using the extraordinary energy of phosphenes.

meta._et_pb_old_content: A 110 minutes audio set with 1 track in .mp3 format. This theoretical and practical course of Phosphenic Mixing is ideal for children and adults in their learning processes. + An e-book ‟The ABC of Phosphenic Mixing" in .pdf format. To be consulted on your computer (Mac or PC) or on your smartphone in order to better understand how to practice this amazing technique.
